You looked at your schedule to see what your classes would be like. “Let’s see here.......P.E. first period, that’ll be a breeze...........Math second.........aw.........English third..........Strength Training for fourth...........Drama class?” You stopped in your tracks. How did the principal even know you wanted to be in your dream class? Your heart was filled with excitement & nervousness at the fun you would have in class, but your secret would be exposed. You continued walking as you read on, “Home Economics for sixth.............& a free period at the end of the day for “creative intuition”.........hm, more schools should do this. What a great way to end the day.” You put your schedule away.

Walking down the hall, you were about to bust a right turn down the hall, when you heard footsteps scurrying along the ground. “Get back here ring tailed scum!” A rough & rugged voice bellowed.
Another voice rebuttled sarcastically, “Oh no! Personal insults! My only weakness!” He laughed at the chaser.
Just then, a raccoon ran past you, almost colliding with you if you’d turned that corner.

He was about your height, smokey grey fur, with a very athletic build. He was sporting midnight blue joggers, a white tee, & a smirk that would make even the gayest girl wet. His eyes were a shiny golden color, & his tail had 3 consecutive dark rings wrapped around it, with the middle ring being the thickest. In his hands were a thick tortoise shell, one that looked like it belonged to a student in this school. The raccoon was hauling ass down the hall adjacent to you.
That’s when you noticed his chaser: An all black stallion horse, complete with the whitest silver eyes you’ve ever seen in your life time! He was on 2 legs, which made him at least 7 feet tall. “What the hell?” Is all you cloud say as you witnessed this chase.

The stallion was keeping speed with the raccoon, “Give me back that shell, Soda!” He neighed in anger.

The raccoon did the quickest 180 you’ve ever seen in history, charging towards the stallion at the same sprint speed he was running away from him with, “How many times do I have to tell you,” He slid up under him, tying the stallion’s mane to a nearby locker with so much speed & precision, “My name, is Sora.” The horse neighed in pain as it tried to free itself from his newfound prison. “Don’t bother, Prince. Your hooves will only make it worse. You’ll just have to wait for a teacher, AGAIN!” Sora laughed as he started walking back toward your directions. You blocked him as soon as you crossed his path.

“Dude, that’s not cool.” You told him, crossing your arms.

The raccoon looked at you with confusion, then chuckled, “You must be the new meat here.” He looked you up & down, “No wonder you have no fur or distinct features.” He held out his hand, placing the tortoise shell in between his other arm & side, “Sora.” You stared at him, unamused by his friendly gesture.

“I don’t like bullies. First you take something from him, then you tie him up?” You slapped his hand away.

Sora placed the tortoise shell on the ground, smiling at you, “Ah.........I love this part........listen, I’m not the villain here, buddy. That giant Buffon you see over there?” He pointed to the stallion, “He’s a giant pervert & the bully you should be “bad coping”. This tortoise shell belongs to a friend of mine, who he likes to mess with on a regular basis. I’m just returning her property from pitiful thieves like him.” He showed you a carving of initials on the inside of the shell: D.W. ( ;) )

“Ah.........I see........good to see a strong one standing up for the weak.” You extended your hand out, “I’m William Tyson. My old friends used to call me “Ty”.” He eagerly shook your hand.

“Nice to meet you, man. Again, I’m Sora. Sora Majesty.” He said brightly.

You tilted your head slightly, “Like.......from the game “Kingdom Hearts”?”

This earned a laugh from him, “Exactly! My parents said they played it everyday during my mother’s pregnancy. She said she wanted me to have a positive mindset & bring people together like the main character did.” He shook his head, “My family sure has a weird way of looking at the world.......” Sora looked behind you, noticing a familiar tortoise jogging up to you two. “& as if on cue, here comes our distressed damsel.”

You turned around to see the most beautiful reptilian ever. She was 4 foot nothing, with a slim & curvy figure. Contrary to the pet turtles you’ve had, her skin looked extremely smooth; her skin color was one of your favorites of all time: Olive green. She carried an ample C cup bust, a very visible six pack, & the sexiest hips that captivated you as she swayed down the hallway towards you two. Her eyes were a nice mixture of green & brown, a perfect hazel color. She had long, flowing brown hair that stopped just at her shoulders, which she waved out of her face as she came closer. Her very presence just oozed charm, & you couldn’t take your eyes off of her.

Sora waved his hand in front of your face to bring you back to reality, “Earth to William? You gonna introduce yourself or what?” You shook your head, slightly embarrassed at your ogling.

“Yeah.......uh, Hi. I’m William Tyson.” You awkwardly waved at the beautiful tortoise.

She chuckled, “You’re cute.” She held out her hand, “Charisma. My friends call me Charm.” You shook her hand, & she pulled you closer, whispering into your ear, “But you can call me whatever you like, sweetie.” She kissed your cheek & pulled back.

Sora laughed & shook his head, “That’s my girl: Always forward in who she likes.” The ring tailed animal handed Charm back her tortoise shell, which she gladly placed on her back. “How many times are you gonna let him keep doing this before you report him for sexual harassment, C?” Sora asked, referring to the stallion who was still struggling to get free from the locker.

“Eh, I like the attention. Even if it’s from a sad little guy like Jarhead.” Charisma stated nonchalantly. She then brought her eyes back to you. “So, What brings a handsome human like you to FH, Mr. Tyson?” She placed her hands on her hips, eagerly awaiting your answer.

You blushed, “Ah, well........in my past schools, all the sports teams were pretty terrible, so I’m hoping to get onto a good sports team here.” You answered, though you were honestly looking forward to your acting classes more than your sports classes.

Sora smiled, “Sounds like you’ll be good for the wrestling team if that’s the case. I’m the captain of it. Tell me, what’s your first class today?”

You showed him your schedule, “P.E.”

“Awesome! My coach is the P.E. teacher! Plus, that’s my first period as well! I can totally get you in if you show him something good!” His tail was swaying rather intensely, “How’s that sound?”

“It sounds like we’re gonna be good friends, Keyblade wielder.” Sora punched you in the arm playfully as you both shared a laugh.

Charm swiped your schedule from Sora, checking out for specific classes. “Aww........I won’t be able to see you until Drama, & then I’ll have to wait at the end of the day to mess with you during our free period.” She pouted, handing you back your schedule. Looking at her watch, she gasped, “The bells about to ring, guys! We have to go!” She gave Sora a huge hug, almost taking him off his feet, “Thank you sooooooo much for always sticking up for me, Sky!”

She placed him down, slowly coming up to you, & giving you the most seductive hug you’ve ever felt. She smelled like roses & lavender. “& Thank you for giving my ex a playmate.” She licked your ear, making you shudder in pleasure, “I’ll see you later.” She released the hug & slipped to class.

You realized something she said that made you ponder, “Ex?” Sora placed a hand on your shoulder.

“Yes, you heard correctly: Charisma’s my ex girlfriend. Well.......sort of.” You looked at him like you saw a ghost, “Relax, Ty. I’m not that type of person to get jealous cause of past partners. You’re good if you want to go for it.” Sora looked at his watch, “Shit......5 minutes........come on! I know a short cut!” You started following Sora as he started sprinting down the halls.

You heard something huge fall & a neigh behind you; you looked back to see a 6 foot horse gaining on you & you’re new friend, “SODA!!!!!” You & Sora went through some double doors too small for the horse to fit through. “DAMN YOU, SODA!” The horse struggled to get through the doors, but with no luck.

Sora laughed as he kept sprinting further away from the horse towards the gym, “Better luck next time, Princey!”

‘Sheesh.......’ You thought to yourself, ‘This is gonna be one hell of a school year.........’

Suddenly, a huge, bulky wolf walks in front of you, an evil look in his eye and a smirk on his face.

"Going somewhere?" He chuckled as a crowd appeared in from behind him.

Rolling your eyes, you sighed. 'Here we go again....' You thought.

You looked wolf right in his eyes, "As a matter of fact, I am, and I'd appreciate it if you'd move out my way." You replied, putting your hands into your pocket.

He growled, "I'm going to enjoy eating you, you littl-" with swift movement, you took out three pencils and stabbed the wolf in three vital places, his neck-shoulder area, his side of his stomack near the intestines, and his knee cap.

The wolf howled and stumbled back in pain, trying desperately to pull out the pencils with no avail. You did a quick side step toward the side of the wolf and gave him a round house kick, hurling him face first into the lockers. While he was winded, you pulled out you zippo and an extra pencil, and heated the metal part of it. It turned a bright red color, signifying it was hot.

You rushed to the wolf and dove the hot metal deep in his ear, but not enough to make him deaf.

He howled in pain, "Enough! Stop! I won't bother you any more! Just stop!" The big bad wolf wimpered an d whined as you pulled out all your now bloody pencils.

You grabbed his head and pulled his good ear toward you lips. "Ever try something like that on me again, and I'll make sure they won't find your body." You threw his head into the lockers, making him pass out, limp on the floor.

You grabbed your things and walked in toward the crowed that was behind the wolf. Thier faces hasld many expressions: Fear, anger, gratitude, admire, lust? and bright smiles. Most of the smiles came from the tinier anthros, while the bigger ones were not so much.

One wolf wispered to his friend, "Holy shit! Did you see what he did to Rufus?"

The friend wolf nodded, "We better warn Nanokami about him, she'd want to know about this."

LATER ON.....


You had finally found your classroom and stepped inside. All faces were turned in your direction as you walked in. They all murmured to their friends, pointing your direction.

The teacher, a zebra gleefully greeted you. "Hello! You must be the new transfer student!"

You nodded, handing her your white slip. She takes it and puts it inside her desks drawer before sitting down at her chair.

"Please tell us your name, sir." The teacher said.

You looked at the anthros and smirked. "Leroy Right." you answer, nodding your head.

The zebra clapped her hands together. "Well Mr.Right, please pick any seat you want.

You looked and saw two empty seats. One next to a toned panther, and one next to a busty vixen.



Which seat do you want?
11311.title: Don't mess with Le! >:)

choices: Yurianna was waiting for you after class
You were confronted by a pack of Wolves
113111.content:
You looked over at the two seats that you could choose. The vixen was sitting near a bunch of wolves, and you didn't want to have to lower the percentage of wolves in this school.......at least not for now. You glanced over to the panther, who was sitting way in back. She was mixed in with a bunch of furries that I'm too lazy to name. You decided that it'd be safer to be in a mixed crowd for now. You started toward the seat next to the panther, getting different stares from all the animals that you walked by. One dragon gave you a snort and nodded to you. You looked over to a raccon who's face was beaming with happiness at you. You rolled your eyes as you finally reached your seat next to the panther. With your swift eye movement, you got a full look of the panther. She had black fur with a white furry curved line going down her arm. She also had golden eyes with shady green pupils. As you scaled down her body, you saw that her large breasts were conceald by a purple tight sports bra, and jean shorts that hid a large ass and showed off her toned legs. You also saw that her tail was waving near your side, so you scooted in your seat a bit more.

The Zebra clapped her hands, "Alright class! Let's get started with our assignment on our first day of school!" She turned around and started writing on the chalk board. As you reached in your bookbag to pull out some paper and a pencil to write with, you noticed that the Panther's tail had wrapped around your desk pole closest to her, and she quietly pulled your desk closer & closer until you were only inches away from her. The panther looked down at you and smirked, licking her lips.

You sighed again, 'It was bad enough I had to deal with that dumb wolf, now I have to kick a panther's ass, too?' You took out your stuff, putting it on the desk. You ran a hand through your hair, trying to pay no heed to the purring panther next to you.

After a few mintues of writing down notes, the Panther leaned her head close to your ear, "You trying to avoid talking to me, human?" She chuckled.

You were still writing down your notes as you answered her, "Any reason you pulled my desk so close to you?" You didn't even look to see the expression amusement on her face.

The panther giggled, "You're cute, I liked what you did to Ralph. He was an asshole." You didn't respond to her as you finished writing your notes. She continued, "What's the matter? You afraid of me? Scared I might hurt you?" She purred softly as she put her hand on the back of your chair.

You looked at her with a timid look, "I don't even know you, if anything, scared is the last thing I'd feel about you." You pulled out your book of Vladimir Todd, your favorite book series, and started to read to avoid more conversation with the panther.

She pulled your book away from you and put it in the side of her jean shorts, "Well......" She pulled your desk closer, careful not to make too much noise to attract attention from the teacher or other students. "Why don't we get to know each other?" Her purring got louder as she put her hand on your back, which made you tense. You were about to preform a maneuver to get some distance from her, but you then realised that it would be too noisy, so you just jerked your back to make her get her hand off you. She didn't take it off, "Geez, calm down. I'm not gonna do anything to you." She rubs your back lightly, which calms you down a bit. The panther giggled, "See? Now......My name is Yurianna Lushanne, but everyone just calls me Yuri Lusha, or just Yuri."

You sighed, "I think you already know my name, Yurianna." You slowly looked at her. She has a warm smile on her face.

"Of course I do, Leroy." She purred. "And just call me Yuri." You nodded as she moved in closer, your bodies almost touching. "Mmmmm......I have so many things I want to ask you........"

The teacher lightly taps a ruler on her desk, poiting it towards the back, "Ms.Lusha, now now.....leave the new student alone. He's a student, not your plaything." This caused a snicker from everyone in the classroom.

Yurianna growled under her breath, just loud enough for every furry close by to her, causing them to shut up. She took her hands off you, pushing your desk back to it's proper place.

The teacher nodded, "Good, now back to the lesson....."

A while after the teacher left notes for the whole class to copy, Yuri slid a note onto your desk. You looked at the note, then at the Panther, who winked at you slowly smirking. You looked back at the note & opened it to read it's contents. It read:
Don't think I'm done with you, Leroy. I want to get to know you better......so meet me after class, okay?
- Yuri
You noticed a kiss mark at the corner of the note, & wondered, 'How'd she do that with no lip stick?'



Sure enough, after class........
113111.title: Yurianna, the Panther

choices: The principal (Who also happens to be her father) Joins in on the fun.......
1131112.content:
Just as you started to head out of the exit, you were pulled by your neck into a chocking grapple by a fur covered arm. You struggled to free yourself from your opponent, but their muscular grip was too powerful. Suddenly you heard a low growl as you were pressed closer to the kidnapper's body, "Better get you to this lady before I end up mauling you......" The started heading down the hall away from the direction of the other class rooms.

You were being carried so fast down the halls that you couldn't even register where you were at that moment in time. You DID know that you were getting carried lower & lower, almost to the schools basement. 'This school is huge.' You thought to yourself. The wolf started to slow his pace when he reached the steps, as to not misstep.

With a slight glance, you noticed that your kidnapper was actually another Wolf! "Gah!! Not.....now!!!" In one swift move, you lurched your lower body up, wrapping your legs around his neck before flipping him on to the ground. This cause both of you to tumble down a flight of stairs; You used his bulky exterior to block the stairs before landing on top of him at the bottom floor.

You got up from the kidnapping Wolf & got a better glance at him. He had dark grey fur with a fair amount of fuzz on his chest & stomach. He also seemed to be wearing only camouflage pants & combat boots. You noticed that he had scraps & bruises all over him from the fall, plus his right arm & left leg were bent in the wrong direction.

"The hell is wrong with you wolves? I try to have a decent first day & you think you can try & turn me into a damsel in distress!!" You walked over to the battered wolf, picking up your items that laid on top of him. As you turned, another wolf that suddenly appeared tried to left hook you, you ducked & did a standing split kick that connected with his chin, sending him flying upwards.

More & more wolves started to appear, all with looks of hunger & pure rage. One even barked at you wildly. You sighed, "I'm not going to win....." You assumed your fighting stance, "But you're not going to be left alive once I'm finished!" The wolves started running toward your direction, ready to maul you alive.

"THAT'S ENOUGH!!!"

The wolves stopped, just short of attacking you, when a female wolf appeared at the top of the stairs. The Wolfess had a calm statue & a slight grin on her wolffish mug. She slowly walked down the stairs. As she got closer, you realized that she was taller than all the other wolves, standing at 6'7. She had a very muscular toned structure with an 8 pack of abs. Her hazel eyes were almost mesmerizing. Her fur was a light beige on white. She wore a crop top white tee that barely covered her extremely large F cups, & had on grey sweat pants that hugged her toned legs oh so closely. She stopped right in front of you, towering you like a skyscraper. You were still ready to kill at moments notice.

The female wolf looked up, "Didn't I tell you not to hurt him?!?!" The female wolf growled at her idiotic pack of wolves. They whimpered in response. She then bent down to your level till she was eye to eye with you, sizing you up & down.

"You know, for a little munchkin, you're actually pretty cute." She brushed her hand across your face, causing you to instinctively grab it & flip her over. To your surprise, she landed on her feet, low sweeping you to the ground before pinning your arms & legs down. The wolves behind her started coming closer, growling, until she barked, "BACK!!! YOU'VE ALREADY MESSED IT UP!!!" Causing them to back towards the walls of the 'Highschool Basement'. (Or so you thought)

You struggled with all your might to escape from her grasp, but she was just too strong for your to break free. She suddenly licked your face, cleaning up your wounds that you received from your stair flight. "Relax. I'm not going to hurt you."

You almost laughed, "If you seriously think I'll believe that after what the Brady Bunch over there did to me, you must be dumber than they are." She chuckled at your comeback.

"I'm not asking you to believe me, I'm only asking that you'll listen. I know after the fiasco Dylan just did to get you down here was pretty rough, but we couldn't just ask, now could we?" She slowly started to release you, standing up with her hand out to help you up. "My name is Natalia, but my pack calls me Nanokami. You can just call me Nat."

You stood up on your own.
"I'm just here to give you an offer. An offer that will protect you from getting mauled by my pack, & one that will make sure no horny gals come for you anymore."

"What exactly do you want from me?" You looked, observing your surroundings to look for a way to escape.

"First, you need to know that this offer is optional, & that if you agree, I'll follow the conditions to graduation. But if you disagree, don't be surprised when they start attacking you everyday." This only put you more on edge to kill every single wolf in the room.

"Why are they even bothering me in the first place? I've done nothing to you all. You started bothering ME."

Nat smiled, "Why? There's really no other reason to why we do things other than to be at the top of the school. There's alpha's for a reason."

You crossed your arms, unamused, "All I see is a spoiled tyrant surrounded by a bunch of Beta's." All the wolves started to growl, coming closer & closer towards you. Nat didn't stop them this time, only stayed in from as to keep them behind her. She lifted a hand for them to stop once they were encircling the both of them.

"I like your venom. If I didn't know any better, I'd assume you were a snake in human form." She stared at you intensely, "Such lovely red eyes......" You took a step back, still in a more calming stance ready to strike.

"My offer is this: Join my pack, help them with studies & the "Anthro Valor Battles". You do that, & I'll make sure you won't get messed with, ever again.......plus......." She leaned in & caressed your cheek, "You get to go out with the sexiest Wolfess in the school...." Her tail wagged intensely.

You were actually waiting for someone with a camera to come out & tell you that you've been punked. But this was FAR from fake......she was dead serious about this.......

"Well? What do you say, shorty?"
1131112.title: Nanokami's Offer

choices: You wake up in the nurses office
You wake up in a bedroom with a familiar Panther laying beside you
11311122.content:
The wolf gang eagerly awaited your answer, drool dripping from their mouths as their tongue hung out in pure hunger. It seemed that "No" wasn't an option that this Wolfess was giving you. You stood firm, looking around for any form of an exit, but all you were surrounded by was brick walls & a stair case that was blocked by 3 wolves.

"This is insane......I come for education, & I get threatened by a power hungry gang of beasts......" You said to yourself, unfortunately out loud.

One wolf slashed you in your chest for your statement, "How DARE you insult Nanokami!!! You swine!!" It was his last words before Natalia grabbed his neck, & punching him in the center of his lower back, paralyzing him from the neck down. The wolf howled in agonizing pain.

"How many times do I have to tell you idiots......" With a firm grip, she flung the helpless beta wolf towards the brick wall, which almost caved in from the wolf's collision, "NOT, TO, HURT, HIM?!?!" This cause the rest of the wolves to back off away from you too, some going to cater to the battered wolf.

You clutched your stomach, covering the fresh wound that the wolf gave you. Blood dripped to the floor in a steady flow as you began to lose your strength. Natalia started coming closer to you with a worried look on her face. You weakly waved her away, "NO!! Get away! You've done enough!"

Natalia gave you a stern look, only approaching closer, "You're hurt. Let me help you."

Natalia was within arms reach, about to remove your hand to take a look at your wound, right before you grabbed her arm, tripping her in a swift motion, & tossing her to a corner. You knew she'd recover quickly from this & started towards the stairs with all the strength you had.

Natalia landed from the throw, a wild smirk on her face, "I guess I'll take that as a no to the offer then, Leroy?" She stood tall & started walking in your direction. "I can change that......."

The three wolves guarding the stairs growled as you came closer. 'Shit!' You thought, 'Gotta think....' As you closed in on the wolves, you noticed that although they were huge & bulky, they were also extremely slow. (& possibly dumb....)

Still clutching your wound, you pretended that you were going to jump over them, doing a slight hop. The wolves jumped up high, expecting to chomp you with their razor sharp teeth, but only grabbed air. Before they landed, you slid underneath the wolves & strode up the stairs, taking 3 at a time. The three wolves were about to give chase, when Natalia yipped to keep them at bay.

Natalia laughed, "You won't get far, shorty!!" She then started to run up the wall towards the stairs.

You paid no head, & just keep striding, almost to the door leading back to the main building. Once you reached the last 4 steps to the main door, Nat landed in front of it, causing you to careen into her arms. You struggled from her grasp, gasping in pain once you realized you were still injured. She hugged you close to her chest, bringing your face closer.

You caught her eyes once you stopped struggling, seeing the passion & enticement within them........she started to lean her face in closer.

But you couldn't just let yourself be her slave, "No.....No....!" You struggled to escape her mesmerizing gaze. She rubbed the back of your head, bringing it closer to hers.

"Shh.....just give into me......" Natalia leaned in to give you a kiss.......

When a tall figure grabbed her shoulder.

"That's quite enough, Natalia."

You looked up to see another tall wolf, even taller than Natalia. He even had the same beige on white fur color as she did. Instead of hazel, his eyes were bright blue.

"Put Leroy down. Now." He glared at Nat with full intent to take her down if she refused.

Natalia whimpered, "Daddy........you're embarrassing me....."

Daddy? Who was this guy? You contemplated this as you started to lose consciousness, "Not.......another.......wolf....." Natalia placed you on the ground, & her supposed father kneeled down to you, pressing a towel to your wound. You could barely just make out another figure standing behind him.

He sighed with disappointment, "I'll have to take him to the nurse so she can........blood......system.........grounded."

The words faded away as you started to pass out.

"Don't worry Le........I'll make sure you're never in danger again."

"Who is that.....? Yuri......?"
11311122.title: Savior's of The Day

choices: A nurse snake, Mr. Simmons, accompanied by Nanokami, enters the room
113111222.content:
"Such a shame..........to think that you could ever be anything other than a speck of dirt in the ground........worthless.........how you've made it this far in your short life boggles me to this day,"

The voice rang heavily in your ears as you struggled against your bindings. You were strapped to a table, almost completely naked, barring your underwear. A blindfold shielded your vision, so you had to rely on your other 4 senses. The room you were in was humid, with a slight hint of ether & gasoline. The table you were lying on felt as cold as ice. Ironic how such a hot room couldn't even effect the steel metal of a table with even the slightest degree of heat.

Your face & mouth were still so sore from the beatings given earlier by the vicious person who spoke with such a demonic tone.

WHAPA!!!

"DAAAAAAHHGGGGG!!!" You writhed in agony as his leather whip struck you. Frantically struggling against your bounds, you gurggled through your swolen mouth one word: "WHY???!!!!!!"

The mysterious voice answered: "Why? Because...........you were born, my dear son..........you took your mother away with your birth, my love.............my soul............& she's inside you..........her essence. & I--

WHAPHA!

"WANT!"

WHAPA!

"HER!!!!"

WHAPA!

"BACK!!!"

WHAPA! WHAPA! WHAPA!

You hollered like a wild animal as the man whipped you, each hit stronger & more painful than the last. "I didn't do it.......I didn't do it..........I didn't do it!" Your yelling finally got through, as the demonic man stopped, leaning close to your ear.

"Ah........see that's just the thing, Leroy.........You DID do it.........you killed her!" he growled

That sent you over the edge, through your broken jaw, you yelled, "NOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!"

The demonic voice laughed, the evil echoing all across the entire room, "THAT'S IT, BOY!!! SCREAM!! SCREAM FOR YOUR SOON TO BE ENDED LIFE!!!! LEROYYYYYYYYYYYY!!!!!"

"Leroy!!! Wake up!!!" A concerned voice yelled, but softer........& familiar.

You rose from your hospital bed in a fright, your heart racing as you felt your body for any signs of harm. That's when you grazed your chest wounds. "Ouch! Damn it..........." That's when you noticed Yuri sitting next to you; a heartbeat monitor was beeping at an insanely fast rate, slowing down per minute as you realized that you were in the school's nursing room.

Yuri laid you back down on the bed, "Relax..........You're safe now."

You almost laughed at the asinine words escaping her mouth, "Safe? I literally almost got mauled by a pack of ferocious wolves while their leader was trying to rape me!" You angrily tried to take out your IV. "I knew coming to this school was a bad idea."

"Leroy, stop it!" Yuri pressed her paw into your wounds, making you wince & lay back down in your bed shaped prison. "Sorry.........I know you're upset, but you need to rest your body before you open your injuries back up." Yuri was dressed in a nursing gown & oragami sail boat shaped hat with the hospital plus logo on it. You noticed the logo was made of 2 red snakes.

You sighed, accepting your defeat. "Alright............I didn't know you were a nurse."

Yuri chuckled, "There's alot of things you don't know about me, Leroy." She grabbed a thernometer from her operating table, "Say 'Ahh'. I need to check to see if you're getting a fever or not." You did as you were told, letting the meter raise to check your tempature level. "Hmm..........97.9. You're pretty stable." She put away all her tools & gadgets. "Now..........tell me what's on your mind. How did you end up in this mess with the wolves?" She eagerly awaited your answer.

"Oh, where should I even start?" You tapped your chin, the sarcasm ringing loud & clear. "Oh right! I got wolf-handled by a bunch of simps working for a sadistic female wolf, who-- get this -- also happens to be the daughter of the principal!"

Yuri gasped, "Natalia did this?"

"Yes, it was all a plot to get me to be her boyfriend. She sure has a cowardly way of doing things." You shook your head in pity.

Yuri sighed, swaying her tail in thought, "Not this again........."

Your crimson red eyes widened, "Again? You're telling me this is a recurring series of events?"

Yuri's ears lowered, "In a way..........you see, Nat has been spoiled basically since she was born. Mr. Simmons, her dad & the principal, lost many of his children before they were born, so when Nat came in the picture, he cherised her to the fullest. He gave her everything in his power: All the toys she wanted, the best books, put her in the best clubs & sports, let her do pretty much anything that wasn't illegal, & accepted each & every boy she wanted to go out with." Yuri scoffed in disgust, thinking of all her past times with Nanokami.

She continued, "Every time she wanted a guy she thought was remotely cute, she would either send her wolf pack, which was made up of all boys who wanted her so badly, to go & get him." You scowled as she told this horrific tale, "She would always give the boys an ultimatum: Go out with me, or I have my pack bully you for the rest of the school year. Every boy that refused was beat up, mauled, or abused to the point where they had to transfer schools. Every boy that agreed..........Well, she showed him off like a trophy, got insanely jealous if he even talked to a female teacher, & got super possessive of him. There was this one squirrel she was dating, she was so into him that she wouldn't even let him go home to his parents. He would either be with her at her house or at the many hotels she'd often go to when she didn't want to be home."

You crossed your arms, making sure not to touch your wounds, "So what happened to them once they decided to break up with her?"

Yuri's eyes lowered, "That's what I'm wondering.........every time I asked her, she would always tell me 'He couldn't handle me' or 'I moved on'. But we never saw those boys after she said that. They never came to school, but they weren't reported as missing by the parents, either. The parents would say they went to go live with close relatives or they transferred to a private school."

'Something is very wrong here.......' You thought, worried you might end up as the next missing ex. You looked up to Yuri, her black fur glistening in the room's lights, "You seem to know alot about her, are you guys friends?"

"We used to be." Yuri answered, the sour tone making it seem as if she regreted that decision, "She did something that I couldn't forgive..............now, I keep mostly to myself. I have a small circle that I protect with my life." She looked at you sincirely, "And I'm hoping to add one more."

You took a deep breath, soaking in all this information. This schools was a lot more interesting than you thought it would be. "Why do you want to protect me so badly, though?"

Yuri blushed, though you couldn't see it through her fur, "Well..........you seem like a cool guy, once you get past all of that "Bad boy" defenses you seem to have. Plus............you're super cute. I love your red eyes." She purred seductively.

You smirked at her flattery. "I must admit, I do owe you for taking good care of the damages I recieved, so I guess a friendship wouldn't hurt. I'll need the protection now that I'm injured." This time, you had a genuine smile aimed in her direction.

"Yay! I knew you'd come around!" She jumped up & down, clapping in excitement. She immediately ceased & got serious, "One more question.........."

"Yeah?" You took a sip of water from the cup sitting beside you.

"When you were out, you keep saying 'I didn't do it' & 'Stop, no more.'........." You looked at Yuri defensively; she contined. "You also struggled alot to the point we had to strap you down just to put the bandages on you...........is there something bad happened that to you? I've seen the scars..............It looks like you've been through alot............." Yuri wrapped her tail around her waist, staring into the ground, waiting for your answer.

You looked off into the distance, "I have................It's painful to remember, but it haunts me still to this day..........."
113111222.title: Scars exposed, Bonds created.

choices: Natalia’s been listening the whole time (Nanokami walks in)
1131112221.content:
Yuri leaned in close as Leroy stared off into the distance, mesmerized by his masculine form.

He took a deep breath, closing his eyes, then looked Yuri in her eyes, “If you tell ANYONE about this, I will be your worst nightmare.” The anger within his eyes almost burned Yuri’s retinas with how hard he stared at her, waiting for her answer.

Her ears lowered, looking towards the ground, “You still don’t trust me........? That hurts, Leroy........” She looked at him, calmly stating, “If you tell me your past, I will tell you mine. If not, I’ll just treat your wounds & leave you alone for a bit. Deal?” Yuri smiled, hopeful her bargain would help the young boy open up.

Leroy’s face softened, he nodded, “Deal.”

“Good. Now.......” Yuri lifted her ears up, “I’m all ears.”

Leroy chuckled, “Alright...........man..........it was in Miami, Florida.........where I was born.........”

“My mother was a beautiful psychiatrist & therapist, working with people to help identify issues within their subconscious mind so they can change themselves from within.”

Yuri’s eyes got huge, glistening as she listened to his story.

He continued, “She was pale skinned, with red eyes & jet black hair like me. Her goal in life was to help others help themselves by helping them find their purpose in life. Ivory Wright, her name was............I miss her to this day.........” Leroy sorrowfully looked deeply into his bandaged hands.

“.......what happened to her......?” Yuri asked hesitantly.

“............Before I was born, she had, according to her coworkers, the most egregious patient walk into her office to talk about his problems.” Leroy’s heartbeat started to increase, the heart monitor beeping 10 times faster than before, “That patient was my dad.” A single tear rolled down his face, the anger within turning his face almost as red as his eyes.

Yuri could almost physically feel his pain. She placed her hand on his arm, softly. “Keep going. I’m here.” She assured him, her eyes just as watery.

“My father, Logan Terror..............he was born an orphan, abandoned by his parents from birth. He was place in broken home after broken home by the time he could walk.........each family brought him back to the orphanage, saying “He’s too destructive. Too out of control.”............he couldn’t even make friends with how violent & destructive he was........always breaking things, arguing with the owners & workers, running away for nights on end. He just couldn’t couldn’t get his act right, no matter how hard he tried...........” Leroy paused, wiping his face with the blanket that covered him.

“That was when he met my Nana, the sweetest lady ever to exist on this Earth: Miss Kimberly Oliver. She took him in, believing there was some trace of good inside of him. There was something all those other home couldn’t give him: Love & affection. All the other foster parents used him in horrific ways: A punching bag whenever the father came home drunk, a means to verbally destroy his emotions from the mother felt hurt by his actions, I believe all those bad homes, combined with the fact that his parents never even wanted him in the first place, drove him mad.”

Yuri was fixated on Leroy as he delved deeper into the depths of his haunting past.

“My Nana, about her mid 60’s by the time I was born, was the best mother figure you could ask for. She read me bed time stories, taught me about life, basic communication skills, right from wrong, to stand up for what I believe in, & to never be afraid to protect yourself or the people you cherish the most.”
For perhaps the first time ever, Leroy genuinely smile when thinking about that old, Nicaraguan lady who took in a scumbag like his father.

“My father, though given love & affection, couldn’t let go of his demons, however. He was in & out of jail. He even went to a few insane asylums for months, only managing to escape by pretending to be “cured” or a “changed man”.” Leroy scoffed, almost spitting at the lies he knew were said to him.

“He would hurt everything he touched until he came around Nana. It was then that he could do no harm to her. He would smile, ask her about her day, even cook for her. He said he could never hurt such a sweet person.”

Leroy’s eyes lowered, “It was one unfaithful day, around the time I was almost 13 years old, my dad married that psychiatrist, building his family & his life together, that both my Nana & my my mother seemed to have caught an illness almost instantaneously.”

Yuri gasped, covering her mouth with her paws.

“For Nana, it was mainly old age. It was almost her time to go. She told me to never stop being just who I am. & that I’m never alone in this world. There will always be someone who cares for you in this world.................” Leroy sniffled, a single year falling from his face, “I held her hand as she pasted away.”

“As for my mother, the stress of dealing with mental patients started to take a toll on her body. She was very mindful of her health, but her goals to try & save each & every patient almost destroyed her.” Leroy recalled the stories: “There were patients who told her that life was meaningless, patients who hurt themselves right in front of her, patients who seemed to have been making tremendous progress, but were found dead months later.”

The tears on Leroy’s face started to fall like rain, “...........she died from a heart attack.........I swear, it was if she could feel every beat, the way she clutched her chest.” He gripped his hand over his heart, almost feeling it directly, “I was almost 12 years old, holding my mother in my arms as she pasted from me so abruptly. I didn’t know what was happening, but I knew I had to do something. I still can remember her looking directly into my eyes as the life instantly left her body..........I was devastated.”

Yuri started crying softly, “Oh my god.........this is what you’ve been holding onto for so long?”

Leroy shook his head, “It gets worse.”

Yuri looked at him, awaiting the end of this tale.

“My father understood Nana dying. He wasn’t as sad. He just couldn’t bear to witness it firsthand. So, he visited her grave every day after the funeral. I remember waiting in the car after he picked me up from school, seeing him drop to his knees & sob to the heavens.......If they even existed at that point.” Leroy was hesitant about the upcoming part, barely able to form the words coming, “But.........when he saw my mom dead on the floor with my arms wrapped around her, somewhere in his warped mind, he thought that I killed her.”

“Everyday afterwards, he would beat me in every way imaginable: Fists, belts, shoes, whips, sticks, chains, he even came after me with a knife.”

Yuri was practically bawling softly at this point, her face buried in his hands as he confessed his problems to this new panther girl he just met.

“All the time, asking me “why did I take her from him?” & every time, I told him I didn’t do it. But he couldn’t accept that answer. He wanted me to somehow bring her back to life, or find a way to end mine.............a few months down the line, neighbors found me bruised & beaten on the floor in our run down house, my dad upstairs in bed holding my mother’s dead carcass in his arms. They called child services for me & took my dad in for child abuse & what they “thought” was first degree murder.”

“The services deemed it too dangerous for me to stay in my hometown, so I was homeschooled, jumping from home to home, never really having a family again..........then I ended up here thanks to a Grizzly bear, Rufus. He took me in as his own, enrolling me in this school, telling me it’d change my life for the better...........so, that’s everything.”

Leroy laid back down, closing his eyes, focusing on the air circling around him as to not think about the painful things he went through. He felt a warm wet material sliding across his face. His eyes opened to Yuri licking him, tears rolling down her golden, dilated eyes.

“Thank you. Now it’s my turn.”

11311122213.content:
“Awww, such a sad tale.” A familiar voice said out of view. “Who would’ve thought that under such a seemingly impenetrable exterior, lied a soft, vulnerable boy who’s been hurt by the entire world? It almost makes me wanna cry.............almost.”

Leroy’s blood started to boil as he recognized the voice, his heart monitor literally beating to untraceable beats per minute.

Yuri’s eyes widened, “Leroy, calm down! You’re too weak to stress your heart like this!” She held his forearm, physically pleading him.

Natalia slowly entered the room, her crystal blue eyes filled with a trace of guilt as she looked over at Leroy in his most weakened state. She started to approach the Panther & young man with no caution.

Leroy started rising from his bed, lifting the covers, nothing but pure rage as red as his crimson eyes coursing through his veins, “I’m gonna kill you, you sadistic bitch.” He started to remove his I.V. from his wrist.

Yuri gasped, “LEROY!!! STOP!!” She pressed his bandaged chest, causing him to wince & cease his resistance.

Natalia did nothing but smirked. Filled with amusement at such a compassionate human. “You amaze me, shorty.........still fueled with the fire of a thousand suns, even when you’re completely outmatched.........” She sighed, grabbing the nearest chair, “I guess I went a bit too far with our little play date, huh?!”

“Natalia, is this a fucking joke?!?! Look at what you did to him!!!” Yuri pointed to your many scrapes & bruises. “Your pack could’ve killed him!!! Do you have ANY idea what your actions do to people?”

Natalia yawned, stretching herself out, “All he had to do was accept my offer, & none of that would’ve happened.” She relaxed in her chair, “I gotta say, shorty, you’re a lot different than all of the boys I’ve sunk my teeth into.........” Nat moaned slightly, gliding her hands down her sculpted yet curved thighs, “I wonder if you’re packing as much fire in those trousers as your heart has...........?”

Yuri stood up, the vein on her forehead as bright as day, “Leave. Now.”

Natalia chuckled, “Or what, Yurianna? You’ll “rip my heart out?” Again?” Natalia rose from her chair, “Or maybe, you’ll tell my daddy?” She school in fear sarcastically before bursting out in laughter.

“She doesn’t need to. You’re already in trouble, young lady.” Suddenly, another wolf, 3 inches taller than Natalia, (making him the tallest wolf in the school) entered the room.

Natalia turned around, lowering her tail as she faced her doom, “D-daddy!! I was just looking for you! It looks like the new kid is making great recov-“

“Didn’t I tell you to stay away from Mr. Right?” His voice rang with pure authority.

Natalia whimpered, “But daddy.........I.......I like him..........”

“I don’t give a damn, young lady. You will NOT give this school a bad name with anymore of your shenanigans.” He growled, “Now, out. I will deal with you later.”

Natalia’s ears lowered in defeat, slowly walking out of the door..........but not before catching eyes with Leroy, blowing a kiss & winking as she exited.

Leroy shook his head in disgust. He turned his attention to the male wolf.

He was literally a tree. 7’0 feet tall. His fur color was a darker beige than Natalia’s, with a white inner pattern. He donned an all black 3 piece business suit, a solid red tie, white collar shirt, & brown loafers.

Leroy crosses his arms, “I’m assuming this is princess’ father?”

He nodded in agreement, “Mr. Nathaniel Nanokami. But please, call me Mr. Nate.” He held his hand out.

Leroy only stared at him unamused, “Your daughter & her betas tried to kill me.”

He sighed, pulling a chair up next to him, “She’s quite a handful, no? I have to say, I feel like I failed as a parent at times with how she acts...........” Mr. Nate shook his head in disappointment, “Please, accept my most sincerest apologies. You’re one of the first human students to ever come to my school. Though you had a rough end to your first day, I hope you didn’t have any intentions of switching schools or making any reports. My biggest concern is the safety of my students.”

Leroy scoffed, “Could’ve fooled me. I’m not your daughter’s first victim, nor will I be her last. She’s a monster. Possibly a murderer. What happened to that one animal student who never came back to school after he broke up with her?”

Mr. Nate looked off into the distance, “I was able to save him before it was too late.........he was moved to another school, despite the rumors.”

Yuri sighed in relief, “Oliver.......he’s still alive.........”

Mr. Nate looked back at Leroy, “Listen........take this.” He handed Leroy whistle. Leroy looked at him confused. “It’s a whistle I made specifically for Natalia..........when she got too out of hand as a child, I used this as a form of punishment, which made her submissive & calm. Though.........it’s painful to her when used too long.........”

Leroy frowned, “As much as she deserves hearing this whistle till she dies, I’m not heartless.” He handed it back to Mr. Nate, “I won’t deliberately hurt your daughter.”

Mr. Nate smiled, “I appreciate that........but........” He handed the whistle to Yuri, who willingly accepted it, “My main concern is your safety. You’re a special student, & I want to ensure your graduate from this school.”

Mr. Nate stood up, “It was nice meeting you, Mr. Right. I can tell you’re a man of action.” He started to exit the nursing room, stoping right at the exit. “Please do look into extra curricular activities. The “Anthro Valor Battles” seems like it’s right up your alley.” Mr. Nate then exited the room.

Leroy fell back on his bed, sighing in relief. ‘What the hell did I get myself into, Rufus.............?’

Yuri continued to treat his wounds.
